Featured Projects

MonkeyPaw

  • Solidity
  • ChainLink
  • Web3.js

This project won a prize in the 2020 ChainLink Hackathon. It combines a custom EA, smart contract, and UI to create a decentralized platform for users to confirm that their Github PR has been merged, and if it has they receive ERC-20 token.

Check it out
